result.execSummary:
Harold Mauruce Daniels was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Harold Mauruce Daniels was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Harold Mauruce Daniels

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels not in court, defendant in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant has been turned over to the State of Ohio on 05/15/2014.
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in custody.  Dax C Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has previously voluntarily waived extradition and may be released to the State of Ohio after release date of May 16, 2014.  Status conference scheduled for May 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in custody.  Carole R. Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has a pending case set for Status Conference on 04/02/2014 at 8:30 a.m. in Branch 23.
Court adjourns this case to 04/16/2014 at 8:30 a.m. for Status Conference in ICCR.  Status conference scheduled for April 16, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in court with attorney Terese M Dick.  Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has pending case in Branch 23.  Revocation hearing set for 2/19/14.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch ICCR.  Status conference scheduled for March 17, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in court with attorney Terese M Dick.  Defendant Harold Mauruce Daniels in custody.  Nathaniel E. Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.
Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Ohio.
Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.
Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  
Case is adjourned for status in ICCR.  Status conference scheduled for February 14, 2014 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Harold Mauruce Daniels
Current: 2718 W Auer Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States  (Effective: 01-04-2014)
Prior: 748 Chesbrough Street, Toledo, OH 43605
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
